context: Do games play offline, or do I have to be online to play?  Will they work with Win Vista Home Premium 64-bit edition?
response: Games are loaded on your computer. Vista is listed on the OS list. I play mine on my windows 8.1 system.  I hope this helps.

context: mate i have an aussie psn account and i have bought many us games of amazon [digital] would this work the smae
response: Yes, It will. Premium is just an Add-on to the Game, like an unlocking key. And You've already bought "US" Digital games...

context: I don't want Steam on my computer.  Does Civilization IV require Steam and/or an internet connection to play single-player game?
response: No, this version does not require steam. The entire reason I bought this game was because it does not have steam at all.

context: Are all the games multi hands???
response: All of the games are not multi-hand games.  We simply like to play a single hand at a time and each game allows you to choose between single play or various multi-play game action.  The bottom row of game selections are for single play games and will say "Single Play" in it's title.  Hope this helps!

context: Will this stand support the Saitek X55 Rhino
response: Wheel stand Pro can certainly support the Rhino, if you can get the platforms to interface (sit the controllers on) to the wheel stand.

context: is thi compatible to windows 7 home premium
response: It works on my windows 7.  The game is entertaining. You are not going to get any holes in one. You might get par on some. You do not have much control over the ball. If you play golf you will not like the game.

context: Can this game be played on a playstation 2? I don't know anything about video games & consoles.
response: No, only on the PS3, the PS3 isn't region locked so it'll play on an American PS3.

context: Are all the games multi hands???
response: yues, any where from 3 to 100, and various types of poker.

context: does it have a circular octagonal or square gate ? the ps3 version of it has both circular gate and octagonal gate too.  does this bring both ?
response: The arcade stick comes with a Square gate already attached to the joystick, but it provides an Octagonal gate and a Circle gate for you to switch between the three whenever you want.

context: Are the codes for the game and the extra DLC seperate?
response: If you mean by DLC the hearthstone codes yes, for the other things no, since when you register the game it registers as the CE and it gives you automatically the other things

context: Would this work with any headphones like beats or apple headphones?
response: beats and apple head phones don't have a microphone so it probably won't work

context: does it function on a mac?
response: I'm not sure I suggest you contact the Mfg. they can tell youLen Mayo
Yes, I use it with Forza 3 and 4.

context: Do I need to download the sims 3 and this one or does sims seasons come with sims 3 too
response: you need sims3 to start any sims3 have fun it is a great game. I have them all

context: Can this game be played on a playstation 2? I don't know anything about video games & consoles.
response: that's impossible... .. you need to use PS3 gaming system ,  and it only can play on PS3 only
Yes, but only if you have the 2-port (two joystick ports) version of the 5200. The 4-port version requires a special proprietary switch box.

response: Yes, but it hesitates in spots.  But it is always good.

context: after charging with the charger i have how will i pair this with my console. just push the ps button or what?
response: You simply turn your play station on and press the ps button once it's on
